This app is designed based on the "Hedonist" philosophy! It's used to calculate the amount of pleasure and pain one senses in their life. 
 
You can enter the quality of your life in a scale between -3 to +3 for each day. 
 
Alternatively you can estimate the number of a whole month using the field right to the year field at the top of the page. 
 
Then you can see how much pleasure and pain you've sensed overall in your life or in a particular month. 
 
>> How to work with it: 
* Hold your finger on a day to view that day in multiple calendar systems and inside the calendar application of your device. 
* Press the left and right arrows to navigate in month and press longer to jump to 6 months earlier or later. 
* Press the up and down arrows near the "year" field to navigate in years and press longer to jump to 5 year later or earlier. 
* The "Statistics" section describes the status of your entire life, plus a table of tiny cells, each describing a month of your life; long click on the cells to see brief details, double click on them to jump to that month. 
 
Note: this app does not believe in weeks!!
